title: Third Law Hub Series - CDM
content:
[[div class="window-box window-box-list"]]

[[=]]
[[# cdm]]
++ [[[comedown machine hub |Comedown Machine]]]
[[/=]]

A nebbish secretary finds himself at the center of a web of mind control, murder, and Mexican restaurants that threatens to smash the delicate societal order of Three Portlands. //Written by TyGently//

**Prologue: [[[A Confluence of Clandestine Conferences]]]** -- Intro to fast food espionage.
* **1: [[[Slow Animals]]]** -- Casey kills a man.
* **2: [[[Automatic Stop]]]** -- Casey investigates a threat.
* **3: [[[The End Has No End]]]** -- Casey breaks and enters.
**Intermission: [[[Intermission|World Unglued]]]** -- We interrupt this program for an emergency broadcast...
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀• **Interlude: [[[End of an Era]]]** -- Tragedy strikes at Site-64. //Written by Jacob Conwell//
* **4: [[[Threat of Joy]]]** -- Casey seeks unlikely allies.
 * **Interlude: [[[Separate Ways]]]** -- Two survivors send an SOS. //Written by Jacob Conwell//
* **5: [[[Fear of Sleep]]]** -- Casey gets professional help.
* **6: ███ ██████ ███ ███████** -- █████ ███ ██ █████████ ████████████.

**Epilogue:** ##red|Error: Encryption failed. Seek technical assistance immediately.##

[[/div]]
author: GreenWolf
